words.def: a mechanism that can move automatically
Poor quality diamond, used for industrial cutting or abrasion; a poorly crystallized diamond.
footwear that covers the whole foot and lower leg
a crude uncouth ill-bred person lacking culture or refinement
(botany) the usually underground organ that lacks buds or leaves or nodes
a cry or noise made to express displeasure or contempt
the ball-shaped capsule containing the vertebrate eye
take something away by force or without the consent of the owner

a prominent rock or pile of rocks on a hill
a state of decay usually accompanied by an offensive odor

to a degree exceeding normal or proper limits
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
